caption.title: LIP in Sjogren syndrome - axial section
caption.p: The female patient affected by Sjogren syndrome with LIP. Patchy GGOs (arrows) seen predominantly in the lower lobes. The patient developed fever and dyspnea. Despite the typical onset symptoms and the presence of imaging features suspect for COVID-19, RT-PCR was negative.
LIP: lymphocytic interstitial pneumonia; GGO: ground-glass opacity; COVID-19: coronavirus 2019; RT-PCR: reverse transcription-polymerase chain reaction
